ps1.9:1.2_0: Sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiyā pahānāya maggo ceva
ps1.9:1.2_1: hetu ca, sahajātānaṁ dhammānaṁ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, kilesānaṁ pariyādānāya
ps1.9:1.2_2: maggo ceva hetu ca, paṭivedhādivisodhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya
ps1.9:1.2_3: maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, visesādhigamāya maggo ceva
ps1.9:1.2_4: hetu ca, uttaripaṭivedhāya maggo ceva hetu ca, saccābhisamayāya maggo ceva hetu ca,
ps1.9:1.2_5: nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.
ps1.9:2.1_0: Abhiniropanaṭṭhena sammāsaṅkappo micchāsaṅkappassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, sahajātānaṁ
ps1.9:2.1_1: dhammānaṁ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, kilesānaṁ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu
ps1.9:2.1_2: ca, paṭivedhādivisodhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu
ps1.9:2.1_3: ca, cittassa vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, visesādhigamāya maggo ceva hetu ca, uttaripaṭivedhāya
ps1.9:2.1_4: maggo ceva hetu ca, saccābhisamayāya maggo ceva hetu ca, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.
ps1.9:3.1_0: Pariggahaṭṭhena sammāvācā micchāvācāya pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, sahajātānaṁ dhammānaṁ
ps1.9:3.1_1: upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, kilesānaṁ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, paṭivedhādivisodhanāya
ps1.9:3.1_2: maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa vodānāya maggo
ps1.9:3.1_3: ceva hetu ca, visesādhigamāya maggo ceva hetu ca, uttaripaṭivedhāya maggo ceva hetu
ps1.9:3.1_4: ca, saccābhisamayāya maggo ceva hetu ca, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.
ps1.9:4.1_0: Samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena sammākammanto micchākammantassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, sahajātānaṁ
ps1.9:4.1_1: dhammānaṁ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, kilesānaṁ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu
ps1.9:4.1_2: ca paṭivedhādivisodhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu
ps1.9:4.1_3: ca, cittassa vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, visesādhigamāya maggo ceva hetu ca, uttaripaṭivedhāya
ps1.9:4.1_4: maggo ceva hetu ca, saccābhisamayāya maggo ceva hetu ca, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.
ps1.9:5.1: Vodānaṭṭhena sammāājīvo micchāājīvassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca …pe…
ps1.9:5.2: paggahaṭṭhena sammāvāyāmo micchāvāyāmassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca …pe…
ps1.9:5.3: upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena sammāsati micchāsatiyā pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca …pe…
ps1.9:5.4_0: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi micchāsamādhissa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, sahajātānaṁ
ps1.9:5.4_1: dhammānaṁ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, kilesānaṁ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu
ps1.9:5.4_2: ca, paṭivedhādivisodhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu
ps1.9:5.4_3: ca, cittassa vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, visesādhigamāya maggo ceva hetu ca, uttaripaṭivedhāya
ps1.9:5.4_4: maggo ceva hetu ca, saccābhisamayāya maggo ceva hetu ca, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.

ps1.9:7.2_1: anusahagatassa kāmarāgānusayassa paṭighānusayassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, sahajātānaṁ
ps1.9:7.2_2: dhammānaṁ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, kilesānaṁ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu
ps1.9:7.2_3: ca, paṭivedhādivisodhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu
ps1.9:7.2_4: ca, cittassa vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, visesādhigamāya maggo ceva hetu ca, uttaripaṭivedhāya
ps1.9:7.2_5: maggo ceva hetu ca, saccābhisamayāya maggo ceva hetu ca, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.
ps1.9:8.2_0: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi rūparāgassa arūparāgassa mānassa uddhaccassa avijjāya,
ps1.9:8.2_1: mānānusayassa bhavarāgānusayassa avijjānusayassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, sahajātānaṁ
ps1.9:8.2_2: dhammānaṁ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, kilesānaṁ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu
ps1.9:8.2_3: ca, paṭivedhādivisodhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu
ps1.9:8.2_4: ca, cittassa, vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, visesādhigamāya maggo ceva hetu ca, uttaripaṭivedhāya
ps1.9:8.2_5: maggo ceva hetu ca, saccābhisamayāya maggo ceva, hetu ca, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.
ps1.9:9.1_0: Dassanamaggo sammādiṭṭhi, abhiniropanamaggo sammāsaṅkappo, pariggahamaggo sammāvācā,
ps1.9:9.1_1: samuṭṭhānamaggo sammākammanto, vodānamaggo sammāājīvo, paggahamaggo sammāvāyāmo,
ps1.9:10.1: Assaddhiye akampiyamaggo saddhābalaṁ, kosajje akampiyamaggo vīriyabalaṁ, pamāde akampiyamaggo satibalaṁ, uddhacce akampiyamaggo samādhibalaṁ, avijjāya akampiyamaggo paññābalaṁ.
ps1.9:10.2: Adhimokkhamaggo saddhindriyaṁ, paggahamaggo vīriyindriyaṁ, upaṭṭhānamaggo satindriyaṁ, avikkhepamaggo samādhindriyaṁ, dassanamaggo paññindriyaṁ.
ps1.9:11.1_0: Ādhipateyyaṭṭhena indriyā maggo, akampiyaṭṭhena balā maggo, niyyānaṭṭhena bojjhaṅgā
ps1.9:11.1_1: maggo, hetuṭṭhena maggaṅgā maggo, upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena satipaṭṭhānā maggo, padahanaṭṭhena
ps1.9:11.1_2: sammappadhānā maggo, ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhipādā maggo, tathaṭṭhena saccāni maggo, avikkhepaṭṭhena
ps1.9:11.1_3: samatho maggo, anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā maggo, ekarasaṭṭhena samathavipassanā maggo,
ps1.9:11.1_4: anativattanaṭṭhena yuganaddhā maggo, saṁvaraṭṭhena sīlavisuddhi maggo, avikkhepaṭṭhena
ps1.9:11.1_5: cittavisuddhi maggo, dassanaṭṭhena diṭṭhivisuddhi maggo, muttaṭṭhena vimokkho maggo,
ps1.9:11.1_6: paṭivedhaṭṭhena vijjā maggo, pariccāgaṭṭhena vimutti maggo, samucchedaṭṭhena khaye
ps1.9:11.1_7: ñāṇaṁ maggo, chando mūlaṭṭhena maggo, manasikāro samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena maggo, phasso samodhānaṭṭhena
ps1.9:11.1_8: maggo, vedanā samosaraṇaṭṭhena maggo, samādhi pamukhaṭṭhena maggo, sati ādhipateyyaṭṭhena
ps1.9:11.1_9: maggo, paññā taduttaraṭṭhena maggo, vimutti sāraṭṭhena maggo, amatogadhaṁ nibbānaṁ
